meanings.definition: Relating to the skull or cranium.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the cranial injury carefully.
meanings.sent2: The cranial bones protect the brain.
meanings.sent3: The cranial shape of the coconut made it hard to crack open.
meanings.sent4: Her cranial thoughts were as clear as glass.
meanings.sent5: The cranial structure of the building resembled a fortress.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the head.
meanings.sent1: She felt a cranial ache after hitting her head.
meanings.sent2: The cranial nerves control facial expressions.
meanings.sent3: The cranial size of the hat was comically large.
meanings.sent4: His cranial responsibilities weighed heavily on him.
meanings.sent5: The cranial position of the sun indicated it was noon.
